sentence.Network_en: Mauser pistols can only be seen in films nowadays.
sentence.Network_cn: 盒子枪现在只能在电影里看到.

sentence.Network_en: The members of the military team have a Mauser pistol attached to their waist.
sentence.Network_cn: 武工队员们腰间都别着一支匣子枪.

sentence.Network_en: In films about resisting Japanese aggression, Chinese soldiers are often seen with Mauser pistols.
sentence.Network_cn: 抗日影片中, 经常能看到中国军人拿着盒子炮.

PerfectNetExp.abs: maus 高程模型, mauser 多址用户, mausberg 毛斯贝格

means.word_mean: 1. German arms manufacturer and inventor of a repeating rifle and pistol (1838-1914)
2. trademark for a repeating rifle or pistol
